name: Hungry Cat Mahjong HD
description:
More than 250 levels.
Wonderful graphics with cute cats and kittens.
New rules changing the basic ones of Mahjong and make the game an original twist of the genre.
Achievements and online scores via Google Play Service.
Absolutely Free!
our TOU: http://www.tuesdayquest.com/doc/TermsandConditionsTQ.pdf
